author: peiffer
body:
We need this filter for a B2G signal sample including two Higgs bosons in the final state. We want to filter on events with exactly one Higgs boson to decay into photons, the second Higgs boson can have any other decay mode.

The new version of the filter now allows to check for a mother-ID, in our case we want to look for two photons with a Higgs boson as mother.
title: allow to ask for a mother ID in MCMultiParticleFilter
